overview.heading: What is Consul?
overview.body: Consul is a service networking solution that enables teams to manage secure network connectivity between services and across multi-cloud environments and runtimes. Consul offers service discovery, identity-based authorization, L7 traffic management, and service-to-service encryption.

get_started.heading: Get Started
get_started.body: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

cards.heading: Service Mesh
cards.body: Consul Service Mesh provides service-to-service connection authorization and encryption using mTLS.

cards.heading: Kubernetes
cards.body: Deploy Consul to Kubernetes using the Helm chart, sync services between Consul and Kubernetes, and more.

cards.heading: HCP Consul
cards.body: Deploy a managed HCP Consul cluster to quickly get started with Consul's full capabilities.
